page.title: 17CLUBS AND RECREATION
page.content: {Nearly all the children in our school belong to a club and some belong to more than one.The most popular organisation is Cubs with 33 members. Only 20 girls belong to{Brownies. 27 people go{Swimming}regularly although the nearest pool is 12 miles away at Witham.25 children stay for {Drama}club after school on a Wednesday.There is a{Gym}club after {Drama}which 18 people attend.14 girls go to{Tap dancing}and 16 to {Majorettes.}Other clubs are for {Trampoline,Tennis,Badminton,a Band, {Guides}and{Scouts.}There are 23 children who do not belong to any clubs at all.
